name: Slide, Crash, Bounce.
description:
Slide, Crash, Bounce is a fast-paced, no-friction driving simulation game made in one month for the Something Awful Game Dev Challenge X.

Made by Team A For Effort / Brian Folley

Last Updated: August 8th, 2015 (v1.02)

Controls

Menus

  • W,A,S,D : Navigate Menus
  • Enter : Accept

Driving

  • W : Accelerate
  • A,D : Turn Left/Right
  • S : Reverse
  • Mouse Wheel : Zoom in/out

Other

  • M : Toggle Music
  • N : Change Song
